abstract_summ: A 15-day-old neonate was admitted with fever, lethargy, cutaneous mottling, and respiratory distress without cough . His mother had symptoms of Novel coronavirus . So Reverse-Transcription Polymerase Chain Reaction (RT-PCR) was done for the neonate and showed to be positive . Infants and children may play an important role in the transmission of COVID-19 in the community .
